overview:
As a thought leader and serial entrepreneur with more than 15 years of experience in the hospitality and travel verticals, Tom Costello is a recognized authority in the areas of sales, marketing, social media, and hotel marketing and distribution strategies.

Costello currently serves as CEO of Groups International, a company that provides marketing services to the managed and unmanaged group and leisure travel markets and is the parent company to iGroupManagement™, iGroupMeetings™, iGroupHotels™, and iGroupAdvisors™.

In addition to launching Groups International in 2006, Costello co-designed the company’s patent-pending meetings and events solution known as iGroupPlanner™ and in the first quarter of 2011 introduced travel startup Hotelmine™, an online leisure travel site that serves as a direct distribution channel for hotels.
